TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParentControlDesigner extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 擴充支援巢狀控制項之 的設計模式行為。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a that supports nested controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供可以包含子控制項的控制項的設計工具的基底類別。 provides a base class for designers of controls that can contain child controls. 除了方法與功能，繼承自並類別，移除了、 內，選取，而且它會擴充在設計其行為在控制項內排列，讓子系控制項新增至，時間。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the and classes, enables child controls to be added to, removed from, selected within, and arranged within the control whose behavior it extends at design time. 您可以將設計工具與型別，使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作自訂。The following example demonstrates how to implement a custom . 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#1)]

span.span: The to create a component from.

summary.span: 利用指定的工具建立元件或控制項，並將其加入至目前的設計文件。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的元件或控制項被位於目前選取的控制項的中央。The new component or control is positioned at the center of the currently selected control. 此方法會使用預設大小的工具中，如果此工具有指定的預設大小。This method uses the default size for the tool, if the tool has a default size specified. 若要指定的位置或位置和大小的元件或控制項，請使用其中一個其他多載方法。To specify a location or location and size for the component or control, use one of the other overloaded methods.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 利用指定的工具建立元件或控制項，並將其加入至目前的設計文件中指定的位置。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document at the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的元件或控制項是否位於所指定的位置周圍`location`參數。The new component or control is positioned around the location specified by the `location` parameter. 如果此元件的預設大小，此方法會使用預設大小為工具的元件。This method uses the default size for the tool's component, if the component has a default size. 若要指定的位置和大小的元件或控制項，請使用適當的多載方法。To specify a location and size for the component or control, use the appropriate overloaded method.

span.span: A that indicates the default location for a control added to the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設位置通常是 (0，0)。The default location is usually (0,0). 如果容器有特殊的框線，或基於其他原因，通常會變更預設位置。The default location is typically changed if the container has special borders, or for other reasons.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查任何父控制項，可以改為處理作業是拖放處理常式。This method checks any parent control for a drag-and-drop handler that can handle the operation instead. 如果有的話，這個方法會傳遞方法，然後傳回。If one exists, this method passes the to the method and returns. 如果沒有父代拖放處理常式存在，則這個方法會嘗試建立的工具，如果已卸除在設計工具的控制項上的工具箱項目。If no parent drag-and-drop handler exists, this method attempts to create a tool if a toolbox item has been dropped on the designer control.

param.name: x

summary.span: 呼叫以回應在元件上按住滑鼠左鍵。

span.span: Called in response to the left mouse button being pressed and held while over the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以回應在元件上按下滑鼠左的按鈕會呼叫這個方法。This method is called in response to the left mouse button being pressed on a component. 設計工具會覆寫這個方法，以提供"套索"選取機制，在控制項內的元件的基底表單。The designer overrides the base form of this method to provide a "lasso" selection mechanism for components within the control. > [!NOTE] > 您可以傳入以螢幕座標中的點方法的類別來取得控制項相對於左上角之點的座標。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

span.span: Called at the end of a drag-and-drop operation to complete or cancel the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖曳作業結尾處呼叫這個方法。This method is called at the end of a drag operation. 這個方法會認可，或取消拖曳作業。This method either commits to or cancels the drag operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSetCursor() cil managed

summary.span: 提供變更目前滑鼠游標的機會。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to change the current mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定滑鼠資料指標，根據下列規則： 如果工具箱服務選取工具，它可讓工具箱服務來設定資料指標。This method sets the mouse cursor according to the following rules: If the toolbox service has a tool selected, it allows the toolbox service to set the cursor. 否則，滑鼠資料指標會設定為預設的滑鼠游標。Otherwise, the mouse cursor is set to the default mouse cursor.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

span.span: Adjusts the set of properties the component will expose through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這介面方法的覆寫會將一組屬性加入至這個設計工具控制項可讓使用者能夠設定方格中顯示和子控制項的對齊方式的相關的選項。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's control that allow a user to set options related to the grid display and child control alignment. 這個方法會加入下列可瀏覽屬性： `DrawGrid`， `SnapToGrid`，和`GridSize`。This method adds the following browsable properties: `DrawGrid`, `SnapToGrid`, and `GridSize`.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support
